info.title: Creditcards API - Arion banki Fintech Party
info.description:
Undir þessari [þjónustu](/ "e. resource, gæti verið þýtt is. auðlind\viðfang") er að finna upplýsingar um greiðslukort sem innskráður notandi hefur aðgang að. Þegar um er að ræða prófananotanda, eru búin til slembigögnin í fyrstu innskráningu sem notuð eru svo áfram.

Upplýsingarnar eru sambærilegar við gögn sem notendur hafa aðgang í gegnum netbanka, smáforrit og B2B lausnir Arion banka. Grunnupplýsingar um eiginleika greiðslukorts má skoða en undir hverjum korti má svo nálgast hreyfingar eftir tímabilum.
      
Hér má skoða mun ítarlegri [html lýsingu](/creditCards.html "sjá CreditCards.html") á samningnum í GitHub repo fyrir Fintech partý.
Köll á þjónustuna þurfa að innihalda API lykil en sem samþykkt teymi í Fintech Party munu geta sótt um slíka á portal þjónustunnar. Þess utan er þjónustan varinn með OAuth 2.0 heimildarveitingu, sem ýmist fylgir authorization_code eða implicit flæði.
      
Sem stendur er afmörkun heimilda nokkuð gróf, auðkenndur notandi fær aðgang að öllum upplýsingum og aðgerðum undir auðlindinni. Í framtíðinni má sjá fyrir sér að miðla tilteknum upplýsingum sem notandi heimilar og sleppa eða jafnvel maska svæði eftir því hvað passar tengt þjónustuveitendum.

get.description: Allows the user to view the transactions on a card performed during a specific period. The logged-in user has to be a cardholder or the owner of a card and also have permission to see the card. It is possible to get the data by defining page number and page size.

Provides detailed information on individual cards. The logged in user has to be a cardholder or the owner of a card and also have permission to see the card. It does not show amounts on cards in the legal collection process as collection costs are not included in the balance. In such cases null is returned in the field for amounts.

Provides an overview of credit cards. It provides information on cards where the logged-in user is a cardholder or owner of a card, provided that user is entitled to see the credit card. It shows information on cards in active use and cards in the legal collection process. It does not show amounts on cards in the legal collection process as collection costs are not included in the balance. In such cases null is returned in the field for amounts

paging.description: Contains information on paging on the transaction overview.

totalRecords.description: Total number of transactions during period

currencyCode.description: Currency, e.g. ISK, SEK, GBP, USD

transactionId.description: Transaction number from systems at Borgun and Valitor

dueDate.description: Due date yyyymm, e.g. 201106. In which period transaction was made

transactionKey.description: Transaction key description, description e.g. fee for printed bills, money withdrawals, automatic debits

merchantName.description: Name of merchant, e.g. SOS BARNAÞORP Skeljungur - 302 Hagkaup, Skeifan VÍNBÚÐIN HEIÐRÚN

merchantCity.description: City of merchant , e.g. REYKJAVIK, KOPAVOGUR, LONDON PADDIN, TÁLKNAFJÖRÐDUR

merchantCountryCode.description: Merchant country code, e.g. IS, GB, US, SE

processingDate.description: Processing date yyyymmdd, e.g. 20151231. When the transaction was processed

creditCardDetail.title: creditCardDetail
creditCardDetail.description: Notar einfalda nálgun til samræmis við eldri útfærslu.

amountDue.description: Amount due/estimated to be due in ISK

balance.description: Total balance on card in ISK. Can be both + and – figure. Minus figure indicates positive balance. The figure appears as null if card is in legal collection process.

active.description: Is the card active or inactive? This ascertained from status codes from card companies.

cardType.description: Card type e.g. purchasing card, general Arion Bank card, Platinum Arion Bank card

cardRole.description: Main card, extra card or corporate card

limit.description: Credit limit+ Extra credit limit in ISK e.g. 30,000

currentYearTurnover.description: Turnover in current year in ISK

creditLimit.description: Credit limit. Total amount that card owner owes on all cards combined

minPaymentAmount.description: Minimum required payment on card this month. Card companies calculate this amount. Percentage of total debt.

augmentedAuthorizationLimitExpiration.description: Expiry date of increased credit limit

declineBillingStatement.description: Paper free. Billing statement declined. True/false value.

inCollection.description: In legal collection process. True/false values.

olderDebtAmount.description: Older debt. Debt calculated on last due bill, i.e. due date reached and bill still unpaid.

penaltyInterestCurrentPeriod.description: Penalty interest in current period/Calculated penalty interest

transactionAmountCurrentPeriod.description: Transactions in current period. Total use during period

cardPaymentDistributionLoanRemainingBala.description: Remaining payments on payment distribution plan

cardPaymentDistributionRemainingMonths.description: Months remaining on payment distribution plans

isPrepaid.description: Is it pre-paid card or not (Plús card) True/false values

isPrePaidBalance.description: Is there any credit on card? True/false values.

cardTypeDescription.description: Card type, Kreditkort, Veltikort or Plúskort

daysDefaulting.description: Days in default. Calculated from the date of oldest default

firstStageCollection.description: In primary collection process. True/false values.

intermediateCollection.description: In intermediate collection process. True/false values.

isDefaulted.description: The card is defaulted. True/false values.

panId.description: Unique ID of card from Issuer
Unique ID of card from Issuer

amountDue.description: Amount due/estimated to be due in ISK

balance.description: Total balance on card in ISK. Can be both + and – figure. Minus figure indicates positive balance. The figure appears as null if card is in legal collection process.

active.description: Is the card active or inactive? This ascertained from status codes from card companies.

cardType.description: Card type e.g. purchasing card, general Arion Bank card, Platinum Arion Bank card

cardRole.description: Main card, extra card or corporate card

limit.description: Credit limit+ Extra credit limit in ISK e.g. 30,000

currentYearTurnover.description: Turnover in current year in ISK
